original_text:
“Come,” he replied, “and you will see.”
So they went and saw where he was staying, and they spent that day with him. It was about four in the afternoon.
korean_text: 예수께서 이르시되 와서 보라 그러므로 그들이 가서 계신 데를 보고 그 날 함께 거하니 때가 열 시쯤 되었더라

sentences.original_text: and saw where he was staying
and they spent that day with him
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 그날 그와 함께 시간을 보냈다

sentences.original_text: It was about four in the afternoon
